data.name: AveragePriceDesc
data.value: The average sale price in recent sale history with outliers removed beyond three standard deviations of the mean.

data.name: CurrentAveragePriceDesc
data.value: The average sale price in current listings with outliers removed beyond three standard deviations of the mean.

data.name: MinimumPriceDesc
data.value: The minimum price in current listings.

data.name: MaximumPriceDesc
data.value: The maximum price in current listings.

data.name: CurrentMinimumPriceDesc
data.value: The minimum price in current listings across both normal and high quality items.

data.name: HelpMessage
data.value: To check prices, hold your keybind and then hover over an item in your inventory or linked in chat. You can set your keybind (or disable it) in the PriceCheck settings. The prices are averages from Universalis and will not match any specific listings you see on the market board. You can use /pcheck to open the overlay and /pcheckconfig to open settings. If you need help, reach out on discord or open an issue on GitHub. If you want to help add translations, you can submit updates on Crowdin.

data.name: FailedToGetData
data.value: Failed to get data (universalis.app may be down)

data.name: ShowPrices_HelpMarker
data.value: show price or just show advice

data.name: AllowKeybindAfterHover
data.value: Allow keybind to be pressed after hovering over item

data.name: AllowKeybindAfterHover_HelpMarker
data.value: allows you to hold the keybind after the item tooltip has been opened (disable for legacy mode)

data.name: HoverDelay_HelpMarker
data.value: delay (in seconds) before processing after hovering

data.name: ShowOverlay_HelpMarker
data.value: show price check results in overlay window

data.name: ShowOverlayByKeybind_HelpMarker
data.value: show overlay window when keybind is being held

data.name: UseOverlayColors_HelpMarker
data.value: use different colors for overlay based on result

data.name: MaxItems_HelpMarker
data.value: set max number of items in overlay at a time

data.name: HideOverlayTimer_HelpMarker
data.value: hide overlay after x amount of seconds since last price check - you can disable this by setting to zero.

data.name: ShowFailedToProcessInOverlay_HelpMarker
data.value: show error where something went wrong unexpectedly

data.name: ShowFailedToGetDataInOverlay
data.value: Show failed to get data error

data.name: ShowFailedToGetDataInOverlay_HelpMarker
data.value: show error where the plugin couldn't connect to universalis to get the data - usually a problem with your connection or universalis is down

data.name: ShowNoDataAvailableInOverlay_HelpMarker
data.value: show warning where there was no data from universalis available for the item

data.name: ShowNoRecentDataAvailableInOverlay
data.value: Show no recent data available warning

data.name: ShowNoRecentDataAvailableInOverlay_HelpMarker
data.value: show warning where there was no recent data from universalis available for the item within your threshold

data.name: ShowBelowVendorInOverlay
data.value: Show cheaper than vendor price warning

data.name: ShowBelowVendorInOverlay_HelpMarker
data.value: show warning that the market price is cheaper than what you can sell it to a vendor for

data.name: ShowBelowMinimumInOverlay
data.value: Show cheaper than minimum threshold warning

data.name: ShowBelowMinimumInOverlay_HelpMarker
data.value: show warning the price is below your minimum threshold

data.name: ShowUnmarketableInOverlay_HelpMarker
data.value: show warning that the item can't be sold on the market board

data.name: ShowInChat_HelpMarker
data.value: show price check results in chat

data.name: ChatChannel_HelpMarker
data.value: set the chat channel to send messages

data.name: UseChatColors_HelpMarker
data.value: use different colors for chat based on result

data.name: UseItemLinks_HelpMarker
data.value: use item links in chat results

data.name: ShowFailedToProcessInChat_HelpMarker
data.value: show error where something went wrong unexpectedly

data.name: ShowFailedToGetDataInChat
data.value: Show failed to get data error

data.name: ShowFailedToGetDataInChat_HelpMarker
data.value: show error where the plugin couldn't connect to universalis to get the data - usually a problem with your connection or universalis is down

data.name: ShowNoDataAvailableInChat_HelpMarker
data.value: show warning where there was no data from universalis available for the item

data.name: ShowNoRecentDataAvailableInChat
data.value: Show no recent data available warning

data.name: ShowNoRecentDataAvailableInChat_HelpMarker
data.value: show warning where there was no recent data from universalis available for the item within your threshold

data.name: ShowBelowVendorInChat
data.value: Show cheaper than vendor price warning

data.name: ShowBelowVendorInChat_HelpMarker
data.value: show warning that the market price is cheaper than what you can sell it to a vendor for

data.name: ShowBelowMinimumInChat
data.value: Show cheaper than minimum threshold warning

data.name: ShowBelowMinimumInChat_HelpMarker
data.value: show warning the price is below your minimum threshold

data.name: ShowUnmarketableInChat_HelpMarker
data.value: show warning that the item can't be sold on the market board

data.name: ShowToast_HelpMarker
data.value: show price check results in toasts

data.name: KeybindEnabled_HelpMarker
data.value: toggle if keybind is used or just hover

data.name: ShowKeybindInTitleBar_HelpMarker
data.value: toggle if keybind is displayed in titlebar

data.name: PrimaryKeybind_HelpMarker
data.value: set your primary key (e.g. None, Z)

data.name: RestrictInCombat_HelpMarker
data.value: don't process price checks while in combat

data.name: RestrictInContent_HelpMarker
data.value: don't process price checks while in content

data.name: MinimumPrice_HelpMarker
data.value: set minimum price at which actual average will be displayed

data.name: MaxUploadDays_HelpMarker
data.value: set maximum age to avoid using old data
